windows.title: Hey David, did you notice CoPilot? - firat.gomi@trilogy.com - DevFactory Mail - Pinned - High memory usage - 1.5 GB - Google Chrome - Firat (trilogy.com)

uiElements.details: address bar, bookmarks bar, Gmail interface with compose button, settings, and other controls

content.title: Gmail
content.visibleText:
Draft saved
Hi Clare,

I hope that you are well and all is good.

I wanted to reach you personally again because I've noticed that CoPilot is still not enabled for Cores Systems, and this is for the second time. There is no reason for that.

I'm the Product Manager of Jet, and I take a direct interest in our customers' welfare.

I would like to hear your thoughts about Cores and CoPilot since you are a valuable customer for us. We've had many hours for Zoom and Slack conversations, so your feedback is to heart.

You can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. You can be as candid as possible, feedback is to heart.

If you weren't aware of CoPilot yet, you can check this link if it relates to learn more about it and help each other.

Besides this, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to create a connection and help each other.

Best regards,
Firat

Firat Gomi | Product Manager

activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in email communication, as evidenced by the Gmail interface visible in the screenshots. They are composing an email to Clare, discussing the CoPilot feature and its importance for Core Systems. The email is detailed, mentioning previous interactions via Zoom and Slack, and includes a link for further information about CoPilot. This indicates the user's role in customer relations and product management, focusing on ensuring customer satisfaction and addressing issues with the CoPilot feature.

The user is also working with Google Sheets, specifically a document titled 'Jive Copilot Usage 04.06.2024'. The spreadsheet contains columns labeled 'Date', 'Account Name', 'Username', 'Feedback', 'Assigned', and 'Completed', with data entries ranging from '2024-06-04' to '2024-06-12'. The user is filtering data within the sheet, which suggests they are analyzing usage data or feedback related to the Jive Copilot feature. This activity highlights the user's involvement in data analysis and monitoring product usage.

Additionally, the user is seen interacting with HubSpot, specifically the email performance dashboard. The dashboard displays performance metrics such as 'Delivered', 'Opened', 'Clicked', 'Replied', 'Bounced', 'Unsubscribed', and 'Spam reports'. The user is reviewing recipient actions and statuses, which include 'Previously unsubscribed', 'Non-marketing contact', and 'Previously unsubscribed from all subscription types'. This indicates the user's role in marketing or customer outreach, focusing on email campaign performance and recipient engagement.

The user is also engaged in team communication via Microsoft Teams. The chat interface shows a conversation in the 'Jive - TPM/TQ daily' channel, where team members are discussing meeting structures and regular updates to a Google doc. This activity demonstrates the user's involvement in team coordination and project management, ensuring clear communication and documentation of meeting notes and plans.
aiUseSummary: The user utilizes AI tools for various purposes in their workflow. They interact with ChatGPT for research and guidance, as indicated by the link to chatgpt.com. This suggests the user is seeking assistance or information related to their tasks. Additionally, the presence of the Shortwave AI Assistant in the Gmail interface indicates the user is leveraging AI to enhance their email communication, possibly for drafting or managing responses. The AI tools help improve productivity by providing quick access to information and streamlining communication tasks.
